problemSolution.problemHeadline: Why Most Businesses Struggle with Web Design

problem1.title: Too Expensive
problem1.description: Custom websites often cost $5,000-$20,000+, putting them out of reach for many small businesses.

problem2.title: Too Slow
problem2.description: Traditional web design projects can take 2-6 months, delaying your ability to attract customers.

problem3.title: Too Complicated
problem3.description: Complex processes, endless revisions, and technical jargon make the experience frustrating.

solution1.title: Affordable Fixed Price
solution1.description: One transparent price of $990 with no hidden fees or surprise costs.

solution2.title: Fast 3-Week Turnaround
solution2.description: Get your professional landing page live and generating leads in just 3 weeks.

solution3.title: Simple, Streamlined Process
solution3.description: Our proven template and clear process eliminates complexity and delivers results.

whatsIncluded.headline: What's Included in Your $990 Package
whatsIncluded.subheadline: Everything you need for a professional, high-converting landing page

feature1.title: Expert-Designed Layout
feature1.description: A clean, modern, and easy-to-understand structure optimized for visitor engagement and conversions.

feature2.title: Mobile & Desktop Responsive
feature2.description: Looks great and functions perfectly on all devices.

feature3.title: Your Branding Integration
feature3.description: We seamlessly incorporate your logo and brand colors.

feature4.title: Content Placement
feature4.description: We'll populate the page with your provided text and images.

feature5.title: Contact/Lead Form
feature5.description: An integrated form to capture visitor inquiries or leads.

feature6.title: Clear Call-to-Action (CTA)
feature6.description: Strategically placed buttons to guide user actions.

feature7.title: Basic SEO Setup
feature7.description: Essential on-page optimization (page title, meta description) to help search engines find you.

howItWorks.headline: The Simple Process
howItWorks.subheadline: From order to launch in 5 easy steps

step1.title: Order Package & Initial Chat
step1.text: Optional brief call to confirm fit.

step2.title: Submit Your Materials
step2.text: Use a clear form/checklist: logo, text, images, color preferences, font choice.

step4.title: Review & Refine
step4.text: You review the draft; one round of minor tweaks for text/colors included.

step5.title: Launch!
step5.text: We help you get it live or provide the files.

examplesShowcase.headline: Examples of Our Work
examplesShowcase.subheadline: See what your $990 landing page could look like

example1.title: Local Bakery
example1.description: A mouth-watering landing page for a local bakery that showcases their artisanal products and drives in-store visits.
benefits: Online order form for special requests

example2.title: Fitness Challenge
example2.description: An energetic, motivational landing page for a 30-day fitness challenge program with clear sign-up process.
benefits: Community forum access for support and motivation
Simple registration process with payment integration

example3.title: Educational Blog
example3.description: A clean, content-focused landing page for an educational blog that highlights key articles and encourages subscriptions.
benefits: Categorized article previews with featured images

turnaroundTime.headline: Fast Turnaround Time
turnaroundTime.subheadline: Get your professional landing page up and running quickly

mainContent.title: Up to 3 weeks from receiving your final content and preferences
mainContent.description: While most web design projects can take months, our streamlined process and focused approach allows us to deliver your landing page in as little as 3 weeks.

step1.title: Week 1
step1.description: Initial setup, content organization, and design planning based on your materials.

step2.title: Week 2
step2.description: Design implementation, content integration, and functionality development.

step3.title: Week 3
step3.description: Final review, refinements based on your feedback, and preparation for launch.
